subject: Cricket
lead_paragraph: Andrew (Freddie) Flintoff, England's great cricket all-rounder and national treasure, is getting his wounded knee through the Ashes series with Australia on a mix of willpower and injections.
snippet: Andrew (Freddie) Flintoff, England's great cricket all-rounder and national treasure, is getting his wounded knee through the Ashes series with Australia on a mix of willpower and injections.
